title: Construction of such PSC may be allowed touching the plot boundary and accessible from Public Street
clause_text: Construction of such PSC may be allowed touching the plot boundary and accessible from Public Street. The joint open space between the structure of primary user and the structure for PSC shall not be less than required front open space for structure ofprimary user or 3 m whichever ishigher. The PSC to the extent specified shall be permissible free of FSI. Availability of PSC shall be displayed insucha way that it isclearly seen from Public Street.
